item.title: By: drypulse
item.dc:creator: drypulse
item.description: yea my questing theory is the most xp the fastest... so if i need to go to a guy and i don't remember who/where he is, then thott/alla will tell me so i can get my xp faster. i did all this shit the first time through, none of my alts should have to suffer the same fate 8)
item.content:encoded: yea my questing theory is the most xp the fastest… so if i need to go to a guy and i don’t remember who/where he is, then thott/alla will tell me so i can get my xp faster. i did all this shit the first time through, none of my alts should have to suffer the same fate 8)

item.title: By: romp
item.dc:creator: romp
item.description: The hops for the Thunderbrew quest in WestFall drop so rarely now my group had to share theirs with me or we would have been killing the Harvest Reapers for a f---ing long time. And I have to kill 30 Goretusks to get 3 of the Livers for that Westfall stew recipe.
item.content:encoded: The hops for the Thunderbrew quest in WestFall drop so rarely now my group had to share theirs with me or we would have been killing the Harvest Reapers for a f—ing long time. And I have to kill 30 Goretusks to get 3 of the Livers for that Westfall stew recipe.

item.title: By: Tara
item.dc:creator: Tara
item.description:
Wait, are you trying to say that your technique is somehow <em>wrong</em>? I don't understand. That seems perfectly reasonable to me! :) Seriously, that's how I quest all the time. I feel like going to thottbot before I've even read the quest description might be taking it too far, but other than that... If I follow the directions and go to the spot they say and I'm still confused, then come one, thottbot is there to help!
And cooking recipes are rarely as easy as they should be, since the darn animals seem to decide that they're keeping their meat to themselves whenever it becomes a quest to get an otherwise frequent drop. Darn smart food.
item.content:encoded:
Wait, are you trying to say that your technique is somehow wrong? I don’t understand. That seems perfectly reasonable to me! ðŸ™‚ Seriously, that’s how I quest all the time. I feel like going to thottbot before I’ve even read the quest description might be taking it too far, but other than that… If I follow the directions and go to the spot they say and I’m still confused, then come one, thottbot is there to help!

And cooking recipes are rarely as easy as they should be, since the darn animals seem to decide that they’re keeping their meat to themselves whenever it becomes a quest to get an otherwise frequent drop. Darn smart food.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Weird. Mine was gone when I stopped off in Gadget. I hadn't used it in 4-freaking-ever, but griff master told me to saddle up. Think she called me a noob too, but I don't speak dirf.
EDIT: ok, my alt has the griff point still, so either I was drunk on the main without realizing it, or there was something goofy with that. AFK Gamer regrets any implied complaints regarding the Shithold griff point. No, really.
item.content:encoded:
Weird. Mine was gone when I stopped off in Gadget. I hadn’t used it in 4-freaking-ever, but griff master told me to saddle up. Think she called me a noob too, but I don’t speak dirf.

EDIT: ok, my alt has the griff point still, so either I was drunk on the main without realizing it, or there was something goofy with that. AFK Gamer regrets any implied complaints regarding the Shithold griff point. No, really.

item.title: By: drypulse
item.dc:creator: drypulse
item.description: if you had the fp before the zone revamp, your fp still worked.... just so ya know. didn't need to ride out there
item.content:encoded: if you had the fp before the zone revamp, your fp still worked…. just so ya know. didn’t need to ride out there

item.title: By: Elbows
item.dc:creator: Elbows
item.description: One of the great things about adding new non-instanced high level content is that it brings some world PVP back into game somewhere other than BRM. I've just been flying out to Cenarion Hold to pick up some faction and catch beef with alliance outside the town. Fun stuff.
item.content:encoded: One of the great things about adding new non-instanced high level content is that it brings some world PVP back into game somewhere other than BRM. I’ve just been flying out to Cenarion Hold to pick up some faction and catch beef with alliance outside the town. Fun stuff.
